TStreamHelper Methods

Methods
 NameDescription
ReadBuffer<T>(T)

Overloaded. Reads a value of a value type, which could be an Integer, record, etc., from the stream.

WriteBuffer<T>(T)

Overloaded. Writes a value of a value type to the stream.
